title: Miley Cyrus Sings Karen Don't Be Sad & Twinkle Song on 'SNL' (Video)
text: Miley Cyrus served as both host and musical guest for the season premiere of Saturday Night Live on Saturday (October 3) in New York City . The 22-year-old entertainer acted in many of the sketches during the show and in between, took to the stage to perform two of the songs from her new album “Miley [...] »
